dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: List of dimensions across which to perform rollups. Supports wildcards. Defaults to all original dimensions.

timeWindow.title: Time Window
timeWindow.description: The time span of the rollup window. Must be a valid time string (e.g., 10s).

gaugeRollup.title: Gauge Update
gaugeRollup.description: The operation to use when rolling up gauge metrics. Defaults to last.
